message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $150 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I could come down to $165, but that's the lowest I can go.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I would like to counter with a price of $155 for the product. I hope this is acceptable.
